name: A Generous Heart + We Were Dragons Once
name_original: A Generous Heart + We Were Dragons Once
description:
+18!! Games.

As we all know, Valentines Day is right around the corner. It's the perfect chance to sit down, cuddle up and play some gentle games with your beloved. This is a 2 LARP special ideal for whiling away the hours. Both games come with complete instructions and safety mechanics.

A Generous Heart- A small LARP about a wounded knight and the Witch who finds them dying. Focuses on trust and small gestures. 

We Were Dragons, Once- An intimate game about dragons who have given up their forms to become human. Focuses on vulnerability and sharing space.
